nodes.text: Droe was a female Cerean who is the older sister of Jedi Master Ki-Adi-Mundi. When they were younger, Droe hid and protected Ki-Adi when their home village was periodically attacked and pillaged by a gang of raiders led by Bin-Garda-Zon. During the Clone Wars, she, along with the rest of her family on Cerea, were killed during the devastated battle on Cerea between the Galactic Republic and the Confederacy of Independent Systems.
